scripts.heroku-prebuild: cd frontend/team_sync_front && npm install && npm install @vue/cli @vue/cli-service @vue/cli-plugin-babel @vue/cli-plugin-eslint
scripts.heroku-postbuild: cd frontend/team_sync_front && ./node_modules/.bin/vue-cli-service build && cd ../.. && mkdir -p static && cp -r frontend/team_sync_front/dist/* static/
